content:
Set Up Email Alerts for Case Teams

Create email alerts for case teams so that each time a case is created or updated, team members are notified.

Available in: Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions. Available in Salesforce Classic (not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience.

To set up case teams:

* Customize Application
* Manage Users

To create or change workflow rules and actions:
* Customize Application
To create or change email alerts:
* Customize Application

Set up workflow rules that specify which actions on a case send email alerts to team members.

From Setup, enter Workflow Rules in the Quick Find box, then select Workflow Rules. Click New Rule.

Select object: Case. Choose evaluation criteria: Evaluate the rule when a record is created, and every time itâ€™s edited.

Enter rule criteria: choose criteria that match cases for email alerts, such as case status set to New.

Click Save & Next. Add email alerts to workflow rule's criteria.

Click Add Workflow Action and choose New Email Alert. Enter description, unique name, and select email template.

Choose recipients: Case Team from Recipient Type, add team as selected recipients.

Click Save. Activate the workflow rule and its email alert.

Activate the rule by clicking Activate next to the name of the rule in Setup.
title: Setting Up Email Alerts for Case Teams in Service Cloud
